children.name: expand

children.name: collapse
children.description: Fires when the user collapses the content.

parameters.name: instant `Boolean` *optional*

parameters.name: instant `Boolean` *optional*
parameters.description: When set to true the expand action will be performed without animation.

children.name: destroy
children.description: Prepares the **Collapsible** for safe removal from DOM. Detaches all event handlers and removes jQuery.data attributes to avoid memory leaks. Calls destroy method of any child Kendo widgets.> **Important:** This method does not remove the Collapsible element from DOM.

parameters.name: instant `Boolean`
parameters.description: Optional. When set to true the collapse action will be performed without animation.

children.name: inset
children.description: Forses inset appearance - the collapsible panel is padded from the View and receives rounded corners.

children.name: iconPosition
children.description: Sets the icon position in the header of the collapsible widget. Possible values are "left", "right", "top".

children.name: expandIcon
children.description: Sets the icon for the header of the collapsible widget when it is in a expanded state.

children.name: collapseIcon
children.description: Sets the icon for the header of the collapsible widget when it is in a collapsed state.

children.name: collapsed
Example - create initially expanded collapsible panel

children.description: If set to `false` the widget content will be expanded initially. The content of the widget is collapsed by default.

children.name: animation
children.description: Turns on or off the animation of the widget.
